content.raw:
FPS looks improved but still choppy when I send lots of mouse events. Some preliminary printouts reveal that the average FPS under lots of mouse events is about 25.8. Before this PR, I was seeing an average FPS of about 12.5 under these conditions.

`MainWindow` tests all pass with no crashes on my machine. Steve, did you install your workspace before running the test?
content.html:
FPS looks improved but still choppy when I send lots of mouse events. Some preliminary printouts reveal that the average FPS under lots of mouse events is about 25.8. Before this PR, I was seeing an average FPS of about 12.5 under these conditions.

MainWindow tests all pass with no crashes on my machine. Steve, did you install your workspace before running the test?
